Like I said before, I really doubt you would see Hijikata in it anywhere. It's the battle at Goryokaku that is supposed to be in it. They could have completely skipped over his part in all that easily. It's more about some ninja kid or the like. I just thought that if they did show anything of the war in Hokkaido it might be worth my while. That's what I'm really trying to find out.

-MissBehavin
